title: Large Language Models for Telecommunications: A Survey on Principles, Key Techniques, and Opportunities

sections.description: Introduce the topic of Large Language Models (LLMs) in telecommunications, highlighting their growing importance. Discuss the objectives of the survey and its significance in exploring the integration of LLMs and natural language processing within the telecommunications industry.
